评论详情: This product is absolutely amazing. The shirts are so soft and the material is so comforting. It reminded me of the higher end brands that I normally shop at and I 100% highly recommend. Also, the shirt is true to size.

I will say, they’re not the best quality, but I think for the price, I’m still happy with them. They seem to stretch out a bit without retaining shape. But the white is not see-through at all, which is a huge plus for me. They’re very comfortable. I’m five months pregnant right now and they they’ve been growing with me really well, but I think that if I try to wear them post pregnancy, they may be too stretched out.  Overall, I think these are worth the money, but if you do want something that’s going to retain its shape and maybe do some compression, you may have to spend a little more money.
Perfect fit

if you wanted something to make your body more so snatched this is not the item for you, there is no hold, support, or compression. It is really soft so if you just what like a fitted t shirt look these are def for you.

I really wanted to love these, material is great and colors too.  But its uncomfortable to wear a full bottom back when it does not size well with panties, so I returned them.  Wish these come in thong bottoms.
Great every day basic

评论详情: 😍😍I AM SO IMPRESSED AND IN LOVE! Get it now for reference I got size small I’m 5”0 , 120 pounds. It fits perfect it’s a little loose on the armpits & arms how I wanted, not snug at all. The material quality is so soft and doesn't feel cheap. It’s only $7 for one shirt so get this to save ur money instead of buying one for $14. I have no complaints everything is well done❤️

The material is comfortable, breathable, and fitted. My only minor complaint is the tag is kind of itchy and not easy to remove. I would also prefer if it was a seamless bottom or thong fit to avoid panty lines. Otherwise, I want these in a variety of fits! Fits perfect to size.
Thick cotton and ran large. The snap piece is also very cheap. I would not recommend these or suggest size down.

The MLYENX 5 Pack Bodysuits for Women have some great features—I really liked the darker colors, and they’re stylish and versatile.  However, the material is VERY thin, so be aware that anything underneath will be visible. I highly caution anyone considering these to keep this in mind, especially for lighter or more fitted outfits.  While they have potential, the thin fabric may not work for everyone’s needs. Consider carefully before purchasing!
Love the colors! Only issue I have is that they are slightly on the thinner side for fabric.

Bodysuits are a soft material. Sizing is accurate. Stiching around the neck on blue, white and black are questionable. This blue shirt has been washed in cold and line dried, once. I would not recommend these bodysuits for people who want to wear them more than once.

I am usually a medium but I ordered a large because I don't like anything snug. They came in the mail and I tried them on and they fit perfectly. Not to snug where I feel like I can't breath but snug enough to still suck me in perfectly. I also love the fabric, super soft.

These are probably my favorite Amazon purchases of the year. They are stretchy but thick and super comfortable! 10/10! I’m ordering more colors! These have become a staple in my wardrobe. Between throwing on a flannel and being comfy, or throwing on a blazer and dressing them up for work. YOU NEED THESE!
Fast delivery and product was as described

Probably one of the best bodysuits I’ve purchased on here! The material feels comfortable and lightweight! Definitely gonna order more in different colors!

Super comfortable with good stretch. Doesn't stick you like saran wrap. Sizing is accurate. For reference, I'm 5'1" and 168. I purchased L and fits great. One of my best and favorite Amazon purchases.
I am tall with long torso...these are long enough. Nice material for price.
